paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper reports on the identification of TTR variants associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy in patients with distal symmetric painful small-fiber neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: familial amyloid polyneuropathy presenting as DSPSFN
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Three patients with the Ala97Ser mutation were also found using our study protocol, and the diagnosis of familial amyloid polyneuropathy was made.

functional_data.summary: The Ala97Ser mutation is associated with familial amyloid polyneuropathy.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the identified cases.
variants.additional_notes: The study highlights the importance of genetic screening for TTR mutations in patients with DSPSFN.
key_quotes: Three patients with the Ala97Ser mutation were also found using our study protocol, and the diagnosis of familial amyloid polyneuropathy was made.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data regarding the TTR variant was extracted from the main text.
